# _CONCEPTS AND TECHNIQUES_

## _Types of Datasets_

- Record
    - Relational records
    - Data matrix
    - Transaction data
- Graph and network
    - World wide web
    - Spcial or information networks
- Ordered
- Spatial, image and multimedia

## Important Characteristics of Structured Data

- Dimensionality
    - Curse of dimensionality
- Sparsity
    - Only presence counts
- Resolution
    - Patterns depend on the scale
- Distribution
    - Centrality and dispersion
